## CCSelectorCombinedProps.shrink property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A boolean value that specifies whether or not to shrink the selector and phone number input components' labels. See [https://mui.com/material-ui/react-text-field/\#shrink](https://mui.com/material-ui/react-text-field/#shrink) for more information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
shrink?: boolean;
```
